body: Hi Mahmoud, I can't reproduce the problem. Did you set step1, 2 to True? Can you connect the output of SolveAdjacency to askMe component? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/fweuCOUfGgbnVN3-w6RFPhw0S*r9XpeP1QCYDqpo9DWEEVmw9C-ErFB8wnA2fnxa0jah0fr0k7PRjyTe12H37ax0rmn9iW63/Honeybee_GlazingGenerator.png) It also helps if you can open the Glazing Generator component and press test and let me know what is exactly the error message? Let's see if we can get it fixed for you. Thanks, Mostapha
